item.description:
Herb Pearce has done a great job teaching us about the Enneagram of Personality and about relationships. Tonight is a chance to meet singles and also just hang out at Herb’s studio. The suggested cost is $10.00 but no one is turned away because of money, so pay what you can honestly afford. Here is a description of the party from Herb:

“A party for singles. Bring your friends. I'll be available to type people, answer your Enneagram or other typing system questions. I plan on having name tags with people types on them so you can ask questions to each other about your similarities and differences. Who knows? Maybe you'll meet someone special.

Party goes from 6 to 11pm. Show up anytime. I'll provide some vegetarian snacks and dishes. It's a vegetarian potluck party so bring only vegetarian dishes or snacks if you want to bring something, though it's not a requirement to bring anything but yourself. Bring drinks if you want, including wine.”

www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Singles Enneagram Party
